website_summaries.verdict: These triangular dumbbells offer different resistance patterns than round weights.
pros: Made from EVA foam, providing buoyancy and low water absorption
Work upper body, lower body, abdominals, and lower back
Triangle shape gives different resistance than round weights
cons: EVA foam has low water absorption, but still consider storing the weights on end in a tray so any water absorbed can drain

customer_reviews.title: Good Service and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These arrived very quickly. They offered sufficient resistance in the water for my first water aerobics class. I loved replacing the empty and uncomfortable milk jugs the instructor provided with these comfortable barbells. I liked the option of using the pointed end for less resistance versus the flat end for more resistance, After trying a classmate's round version I will buy a set of the bigger round ones in the future for additional resistance. These barbells dried very quickly after use.
customer_reviews.author: Anne, Lancaster, PA

customer_reviews.title: I love these Triangular Aquatic Weights!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with my purchase of these triangular water weights. I started taking water aerobics classes this summer & would always get stuck with using the heavier weights that no one else wanted (mainly due to others hogging the lighter weights for their late arriving friends). I ordered these water weights because of the unique style, lightness & the price. They arrived in two days & I felt awesome showing up to class with these weights. The water resistance is perfect for me & I would highly recommend them to others who are considering purchasing them too.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B.

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with it
customer_reviews.text: These are a lighter weight - I got them because of the different shape. Overall happy with it. The resistance is a little different than typical round weights. Will be switching out between these and the others.
customer_reviews.author: LissyVA

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy to see them finally arrive and have been using ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive it until almost a month after the tracking date said that I would receive it. I do not know what the problem was. When I was suppose to receive them, I fell from a ladder and broke 2 bones in my ankle. I was so happy to see them finally arrive and have been using them in my aquatic exercises for physical therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swim barbells
customer_reviews.text: These do the job nicely, even though the color of blue was slightly different than appeared on-line. When used underwater, these should give you enough resistance to strengthen muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, one class and they are bending up, asking for refund.
customer_reviews.text: They are already curling up on the ends and folding over, not sure about these things. My class just used them for like 1 class so I am disappointed. I think I am going to ask for a refund. I thought they would be way more durable!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my aquatic weights
customer_reviews.text: Due to shoulder injuries, the larger sizes are just too much weight (usually round and blue or black in color). These are slightly smaller, triangular in shape but perfect for my needs. Even in the deep end of the pool. I love the pink color as I can easily find my own weights. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: I am 77 years old and go to a fitness center 3 days a week for water aerobics. These are what the gym uses in the pool area for strength exercises in the water. I bought my own set so I would be assured of having a pair each time I go. They work perfectly for me!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Love my new weights
customer_reviews.text: Because i had an injury in my rotator cuff...i havent been able to use weights in my acqua aerobics classes until i saw these lighter weights and am i happy😌 because now i am finally getting to get strength back and my physical therapist is happy too!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Phyllis M. Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of aquatic dumbbells. I lost one of my first pair and really didn’t want to go a summer without a pair. I have some health issues and I walk in the pool in the summer and use the dumbbells and feel like I get a workout in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like them at all. They came damaged and had a crease that dented the triangle area. I returned them because I questioned their durability. Not the quality I was looking to find.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Amazon never disappoints!
customer_reviews.text: They work fine, I use them a lot. I like the green color, they are what I expected. They give light -medium resistance Thank you, prompt delivery! I love Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Finney

customer_reviews.title: Great pool workout weights
customer_reviews.text: I use these for balance in the pool when I am "bike riding" and for underwater arm exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Good choice and color
customer_reviews.text: These are much easier to use in the eater aerobics class, not so much resistance. I felt much more comfortable with these.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for water therapy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE! I had another set , so this is my second set. Good for water therapy. I ordered a third set for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Ila H.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight so glad I got these....easier for me than the aquatic bells at the Y.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: My grandson's swim teacher suggested these to help give him confidence in learning to swim
customer_reviews.text: They worked! Great not only for swim weights but for confidence booster in children too old to wear the swim vests
customer_reviews.author: mkm

customer_reviews.title: Great for water exercise
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely exactly what I was looking for. Worth every penny spent!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for water aerobics.
customer_reviews.text: Great for water aerobics. They are a good size but would like to have known the lb. weight of resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Caprice B.

customer_reviews.title: Resistance workout
customer_reviews.text: Great for upper body workout. This is my seconds pair.
customer_reviews.author: Calibrookian

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful, you wouldnt think you could get an arm workout but you do.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Leckenby

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I use them for excercises in the pool Good weight training to tone up.
customer_reviews.author: ks

customer_reviews.title: eh...
customer_reviews.text: don't do a lot for me, not great for good workout
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took over four weeks to get it. It is ...
customer_reviews.text: Took over four weeks to get it. It is a little light for work out but that is not a flaw, just too light.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jabbari

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for price
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable compared to similar offerings. I will say they nicked pretty easily but otherwise, they serve their purpose. I'd recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A perfect pool exercise tool
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They give me the pool resistance I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for acquafit!
customer_reviews.text: These weights for acquafit are fantastic. All my friends who tried them bought a pair
customer_reviews.author: Bababiz

customer_reviews.title: Aquq Barbells
customer_reviews.text: They are wonderful. At first glance you don't think they will do anything, but you use them and see how great they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for aquasizing.
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased. They are light enough and heavy enough. Just perfect for small hands. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Benoit

customer_reviews.title: size as it relates to what they're being used for
customer_reviews.text: I'm using them for a water aerobics class... they're the right size and the right weight for my size and my ability level.
customer_reviews.author: letty bass

product_meta.title: Trademark Innovations 12" Triangular Aquatic Exercise Dumbells - Set of 2 - for Water Aerobics
product_meta.description: These easy to store aquatic barbells are a perfect addition to your water aerobics workout. They come as a set of 2. Made from EVA foam, they measure 12"long x 6"wide. While the EVA foam has low water absorption, we recommend storing the weights on end in a tray so any water that may have accumulated can drain. The resistance of the barbells will provide an overall workout for your upper body, lower back and abs. Warning: These are not to be used as a flotation device. Made by Trademark Innovations.
feature_bullets: Made from EVA foam, providing buoyancy and low water Absorption
Each barbell measures 12" long x 6" wide
Triangular shape gives variable resistance and helps work the upper body as well as your lower back and ABS for a total fitness workout
Warning: not to be used as a flotation device. For ages 14+
